room_title: Escape room "The Chamber" by Escape the Place in Colorado Springs
room_description:
You and your work crew are making a last sweep of an abandoned building before it’s leveled when you come across a previously undiscovered chamber within the building’s structure. The chamber seems to contain a fascinating collection of artifacts. What does it all mean?
Unfortunately, the door has locked behind you, leaving all of you trapped with only minutes before auto-detonation occurs. Clues for your escape and ultimate survival are contained within the chamber… but will your crew be able to decipher them and escape in time?
This room is designed as a competition room (up to 6 vs 6 players).
